abstract: Comcast doesn’t sign a petition asking the government to change station retransmission rules.
snippet: Comcast doesn’t sign a petition asking the government to change station retransmission rules.
lead_paragraph: Many of the country’s biggest television providers have signed on to a petition asking the government to revamp station retransmission rules. Cablevision, Charter, DirecTV, Dish Network, Time Warner Cable and Verizon all joined the coalition of providers and nonprofit groups in signing the petition on Tuesday.

headline.main: Comcast Is Absent From Campaign to Change Retransmission Rules
